edu.psu.citeseerx.cache
Class PrefetchBuffer

java.lang.Object
  edu.psu.citeseerx.cache.PrefetchBuffer

public class PrefetchBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

Author: Huajing Li Last modified: 12/7, 2006 Description: prefetchbuffer is a special cache. it does not base on locality. it based on prediction. this is a single unit in the prefetch pool. every user has his own prefetch buffer.
